name: Clunky Lofi Cart Ride
description:
CONTROLS: Use arrow keys to move, jump and rotate in the air. 

Enjoy my first 2D game.

I made it as a means of practice and of having fun while learning to develop in 2D. 

If you enjoy it, be sure to visit my other channels as well, such as YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC4ziYYQzrhWABr4uoNalxYw
